title: Employee Engagement Poll
description: A quick poll to gauge employee morale, gather preferences on company initiatives, or measure short-term satisfaction.

intro.title: Anonymous Employee Feedback
intro.description: Your feedback is important to us! This anonymous poll will help us understand how you're feeling about your work experience and identify areas for improvement. It will take less than 2 minutes to complete.

mood_rating.title: How would you rate your overall work experience this week?
mood_rating.description: Please select the option that best represents your experience.

work_life_balance.title: How satisfied are you with your current work-life balance?

team_collaboration.title: How would you rate the collaboration within your team?

initiative_interest.title: Which of these potential company initiatives would you be most interested in?

suggestion_box.title: Any suggestions for improvement or general feedback?
suggestion_box.description: Your anonymous feedback helps us create a better workplace for everyone.

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: We appreciate your feedback. Your input helps us create a better workplace environment. Results from this poll will be shared in the next company-wide meeting.
